title: Sketches of Lambs, Trees and a House with a Study of a Boulder.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal study showing in the top row a grazing lamb seen obliquely from the left hind leg, a detail view and two views of heads of lambs; a big tree and a house as well as the trunk of a tree in center row; and a study at bottom left a boulder with growth on it.

Verso:  Seen vertically the trunk of a birch whose upper part is hidden by another tree.
name: Drawing
